title: Today’s Bay Area arts and entertainment picks, Oct. 20
text: Today’s Bay Area arts and entertainment picks, Oct. 20 Monday, 19 October 2015 (10 minutes ago) Today’s Bay Area arts and entertainment picks, Oct. 20 The British metal titans are on tour in support of last year’s “Redeemer of Souls.” San Francisco Contemporary Music Players: The ever-irreverent SF Theater Pub takes on a Shakespeare classic with Stuart Bousel’s slasher-comedy adaptation of the similarly named play about a murderous king. 8 p.m. Through Oct. 27. Tollywood Mass actor Ravi Teja and Tamannaah starring Bengal Tiger sound teaser releases today by the Telugu movie makers at 10:30 AM today, listen the sounds for the first time. Recent related news Madonna: The tireless pop star returns to the Bay Area with her “Rebel Heart” tour, promoting the album of the same name. 8 p.m. SAP Center, San Jose.... SFGate 2 days ago - Entertainment The band is on tour in support of its seventh full-length album, “The Waterfall.” “Pound”: In her latest solo show, Marga Gomez turns her satirical eye... SFGate 4 days ago - Entertainment Currently touring North America performing music from her new release, “Blood,” as well as her debut album, “Is Your Love Big Enough?” On tour in support... SFGate 6 days ago - Entertainment San Francisco’s newest chamber ensemble presents a program of string quartets by Wolf, Malipiero and Verdi. 8 p.m. San Francisco Conservatory of Music....
